title: Salmon and spinach lasagne
ingredients: ['6 sheets lasagne pasta', '1 tablespoon oil', '1 onion, chopped', '2 garlic cloves, minced', '400g skinless salmon fillets', '500g fresh spinach', '1 glass white wine', 'salt and pepper to taste', 'For the white sauce', '25g butter', '3 tablespooons plain flour', '250ml single cream', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '1/2 teaspoon ground nutmeg', '220g mozzarella cheese, thinly sliced']
